content: Look Not to Egypt but to God
And trust in chariots because they are many,
And in horsemen because they are very strong,
But they do not look to the Holy One of Israel, nor seek  consult the !
Yet He is also wise and will bring disaster,
And does not retract His words,
But will arise against the house of evildoers
And against the helpers of those who do evil.
Now the Egyptians are men and not God,
And their horses are flesh and not spirit;
And the  will stretch out His hand,
And he (Egypt) who helps will stumble,
And he (Judah) who is helped will fall,
And all of them will perish together.
For so the  says to me,
Return to Him from whom you have so deeply defected, O sons of Israel.
For in that day every man will reject  throw away his idols of silver and his idols of gold [in disgust], which your own hands have sinfully made for you.
